setupWizard.title: Set Up Your Home

step.householdInfoDesc: Enter your household name and address.

step.homeStatisticsDesc: Tell us about your property  size, age, and HOA info.
step.maintenanceItemsDesc: Record HVAC, water system, and safety details for maintenance tracking.
step.vehiclesDesc: Add vehicles associated with your household.

setupWizard.safetyInfo: Keep track of what battery type your smoke and CO detectors use.
